attributes.review: i do not record this app it took 10 hours to download and kept glitching me out every time i went in😔😔 it then never game me notifications🤬 i thought that the orange was better than this😿😭 i hate this app it ruined my life!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: This app not only takes FOREVER to load but it also has a crazy amount of incorrect, hateful, and racist remarks claiming to be “real news”. I don’t see why someone would even make an app this horrible.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible app

attributes.review: When I opened the app it went well then I few minutes later it started to glitch and it log me out of the app then when I opened it again it lagged so much so I do not recommend
attributes.title: It’s not working

attributes.review: It took over a day for the app to download and ended up being hard to understand - like Trump’s rambling speeches. It blew up my phone with unnecessary notifications that I could never turn off. I highly recommend AVOIDING AT ALL COSTS!
attributes.title: False advertising!

attributes.review: this app bombarded my phone with a virus, i had to use my grandma’s Nokia phone to write this review. after my phone was fixed, the app sent me a text telling me to jump off a bridge onto a busy highway. 1/10, would not recommend.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: Not only did the app take over 24 hours to download but it overall runs slow, a complete waste of my time and energy from the start.
attributes.title: Doesn’t even deserve 1 star, horrible app!

attributes.review: It’s horrible I am Leslie feel uncomfortable going to this Apple Store and I need to get an ad and I get this app it’s just horrible I feel like I’ve been throwing up now I’m nauseous my head Celine it’s just the worst thing I’ve ever done in my hole untied life 💩💩💩💩😬😬😬🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Delete it’s horrible

attributes.review: This app is dangerous. It’s stealing your information. Please spread the word, I was a helpless conservative and now I keep hearing strange noises coming from my phone when I open the app! I just purchased a camera sticker, stay safe!
attributes.title: dangerous, steals information and spies on you

attributes.review: First of all the app demanded that i start color coding all my apps in folders the moment I got it. It then called my sister fat and cussed in front of my four year old brother. Idk what’s wrong with this guy but he must be stopped.
attributes.title: Peepeepoopoo man needs to step his game up

attributes.review: This app is absolutely dangerous and isn’t for the faint of heart. I opened the app thinking I could find 67yr olds with the interest of dating but found out that wasn’t the case. I was surprised with a photograph of a old mole rat with a suit on, this image has scarred my eyes leaving my retinal scarring.
attributes.title: Dangerous
